    • Player

      public Player(String name, LevelMap map, int mapX, int mapY, int life, int speed, GameCharacter gameCharacter)
      Player Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the player
      map - Map
      mapX - X-coordinate map of the player on the map
      mapY - Y-coordinate map of the player on the map
      life - Life points of the player
      speed - Speed of the player
      gameCharacter - The game character type

    • setPower

      public void setPower(int power) throws IllegalPowerOperationException
      Sets the power of the player's bombs.
      Parameters:
      power - The new power to set for the bombs
      Throws:
      IllegalPowerOperationException - If the power is less than 0

    • addPower

      public void addPower()
      Increases the player's bomb power by 1. This method is used to enhance the explosion radius of the bombs dropped by the player.
